text: The 1990 FIFA World Cup qualification – UEFA Group 2 was a qualifying group for the 1990 FIFA World Cup. Sweden and England were the two teams that qualified. ==Results== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 6 4 2 0 9 3 +6 10 6 3 3 0 10 0 +10 9 6 2 1 3 4 8 –4 5 6 0 0 6 3 15 –12 0 ==Top scorers== ===2 goals=== * Sokol Kushta * John Barnes * Peter Beardsley * Gary Lineker * Ryszard Tarasiewicz * Johnny Ekström Category:1990 FIFA World Cup qualification (UEFA)
title: 1990 FIFA World Cup qualification – UEFA Group 2
